name: Monkidex
description: Monkidex is a social media website that creates networking opportunities for people who own, love, and are Monkeys! Using features similar to instagram, one can share pictures of their favorite monkeys.

info.technologies: React | Redux | NodeJS | Express | PostgreSQL | CSS | S3

name: DnD FindMe
description: DnD FindMe is a website that creates opportunities for D&D players to connect with each other, and meet up either in person or online to play campaigns.

info.technologies: React | Redux | NodeJS | Express | PostgreSQL | SCSS | Google maps API | Twilio

name: Discord Bot
description: A discord bot that simulates a casino allowing players to play 3 different casino games: Roullette, Slots, and Coinflip. (still a work in progress)
